description:
As part of our continued growth, we are looking for an Accountant to join our Finance team. This is an excellent opportunity for someone eager to advance their accounting career in a collaborative, fast-paced, and supportive environment.


As an Accountant, you will report directly to the Finance Controller and play a key role in managing accounts receivable and payable processes, maintaining accurate financial records, and supporting daily accounting operations across the Group.

\n


Responsibilities
  • Manage the full accounts receivable process, including payment follow-ups and client communication
  • Ensure timely and accurate invoicing and assist in resolving billing issues
  • Process payments and maintain accurate accounting entries (invoices, journals, reconciliations)
  • Support the preparation of management accounts and financial statements
  • Assisting in the implementation and ongoing management of procurement requests through the companyâs procurement tool
  • Assist in the preparation of monthly and annual reports
  • Support internal and external audits with documentation and schedules
  • Contribute to the completion and submission of local VAT returns
  • Prepare various account reconciliations
  • Provide general accounting support and other duties as assigned


Requirements
  • A partly qualified accountant or a degree in Accountancy 
  • 2+ years of experience in a similar role
  • Good knowledge of accounting principles and reporting practices
  • Familiarity with IFRS and Maltese tax/VAT regulations
  • Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel
  • Experience with Xero and/or QuickBooks is an asset
  • Experience in the iGaming sector is a plus
